titles.title: District of Columbia Home Rule Clemency Act
District of Columbia Home Rule Clemency Act
To provide that the authority to grant clemency for offenses against the District of Columbia shall be exercised in accordance with law enacted by the District of Columbia.
District of Columbia Home Rule Clemency Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary:
District of Columbia Home Rule Clemency Act
This bill declares that the authority to grant clemency for offenses against the District of Columbia shall be exercised by such person or persons, and under such terms and conditions, as may be provided under a DC law.
